description:
Lightweight, responsive comfort, no matter how far you're planning to run. Designed for ultramarathons, the Ultra Glide’s mesh upper lets your feet breathe, while SensiFit™ construction offer support and flex as your foot swells later in the race. Protective overlays in key areas deflect rocks and sticks, and a Quicklace™ system makes it easy to tweak the fit or swap in fresh socks at the aid station. Burly Contagrip® lugs grab onto any surface for dependable traction.

  • Synthetic mesh upper is lightweight and highly breathable
  • Protective overlays provide protection from trail debris
  • Sensifit™ construction wraps foot with synthetic overlays to provide a precise, secure fit and abrasion protection
  • EndoFit™ construction offers a performance fit ideal for high-output activity
  • Quicklace™ system allows for fit adjustments on the fly and easy changes at aid stations
  • Reverse camber geometry makes you feel like you are floating over the ground
  • Outsole is aggressively lugged and made from an exceptionally grippy Contagrip® compound, providing reliable traction regardless of surface or weather
name: Salomon Ultra Glide 2 Trail Running Shoes - Men's
